sentences.en: Fiction, nonfiction, and poetry are included.
sentences.cn: 本课程讨论范围包括小说 、 散文 、 诗.

sentences.en: His wanderings yielded some of his finest work, both fiction and nonfiction.
sentences.cn: 这些游历造就了他好些最出色的著作, 包括小说和非小说.

sentences.en: I've read her novels but not her nonfiction.
sentences.cn: 我已经读过了她的小说而不是非小说作品.

sentences.en: In addition, she has written several nonfiction works, including books about cats, a love since childhood.
sentences.cn: 另外, 她还有其他一些非小说作品, 包括关于她从小就爱的猫的书.

sentences.en: Increasing attention has been paid recently to the place of nonfiction in the literary hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 近期,人们开始对非虚构写作在文学中的地位加以注意.

sentences.en: Read the following passage of nonfiction carefully and write a summary.
sentences.cn: 读下面的散文并且写出摘要.

sentences.en: The series will include both fiction and nonfiction.
sentences.cn: 这套丛书将包括小说和纪实作品。

sentences.en: This is the personal transaction that is at the heart of good nonfiction writing.
sentences.cn: 这是一件个人事情,它是好的非小说类作品写作的核心.
嗯,但我较常看非小说类作品.
